Ec2Config.description: The subnet and security group that DataSync uses to access target EFS file system.

properties.name: SecurityGroupArns
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the security groups that are configured for the Amazon EC2 resource.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the security groups that are configured for the Amazon EC2 resource.

properties.name: SubnetArn
properties.description: The ARN of the subnet that DataSync uses to access the target EFS file system.

type.description: The ARN of the subnet that DataSync uses to access the target EFS file system.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

type.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

properties.name: AccessPointArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Amazon EFS Access point that DataSync uses when accessing the EFS file system.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Amazon EFS Access point that DataSync uses when accessing the EFS file system.

properties.name: EfsFilesystemArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Amazon EFS file system.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Amazon EFS file system.

properties.name: FileSystemAccessRoleArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS IAM role that the DataSync will assume when mounting the EFS file system.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS IAM role that the DataSync will assume when mounting the EFS file system.

properties.name: InTransitEncryption
properties.description: Protocol that is used for encrypting the traffic exchanged between the DataSync Agent and the EFS file system.

type.description: Protocol that is used for encrypting the traffic exchanged between the DataSync Agent and the EFS file system.

properties.name: Subdirectory
properties.description: A subdirectory in the location's path. This subdirectory in the EFS file system is used to read data from the EFS source location or write data to the EFS destination.

type.description: A subdirectory in the location's path. This subdirectory in the EFS file system is used to read data from the EFS source location or write data to the EFS destination.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: LocationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon EFS file system location that is created.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon EFS file system location that is created.

properties.name: LocationUri
properties.description: The URL of the EFS location that was described.

type.description: The URL of the EFS location that was described.
